actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-551.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 95-551.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of 100,000 additional copies of the subcommittee print of the Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs of the Committee on Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs entitled "Give Yourself Credit:  Guide to Consumer Credit Laws."

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-551) Directs the reprinting for the use of the Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs of the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs of 100,000 copies of House Document No. 95-167 entitled "Give Yourself Credit: Guide to Consumer Credit Laws."

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of 100,000 additional copies of the subcommittee print of the Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs of the Committee on Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs entitled "Give Yourself Credit:  Guide to Consumer Credit Laws."
